characters.name: Raze
characters.description: You see a person. They have grenades on their waist. They are holding a rocket launcher amnd it looks like they wont leave without putting up a  fight.

characters.name: Sova
characters.description: You see a tall figure. Their eye is a piercing blue . They're all clothed and they have a bow, with three long range, enegry blasts. Looks like they arent going anywhere without a fight.

characters.name: Closet
characters.description: You are in the closet. It is dark.
